description: n-th derivative of x^x at 1, divided by n.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe and Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..400 (first 100 terms from T. D. Noe)
R. K. Guy, The strong law of small numbers. Amer. Math. Monthly 95 (1988), no. 8, 697-712.
maple: a:= n-> (n-1)! *coeftayl(x^x, x=1, n):seq(a(n), n=1..30);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 18 2012
mathematica: Rest[(NestList[ Factor[ D[ #1, x]] &, x^x, 23] /. (x -> 1))/Range[0, 23]] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 10 2010 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _R. K. Guy_
extensions: One more term from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 10 2010
